    DataHandler

    interface for communication with logic

        Parameters:
        achID - achievement ID
        critID - criterion ID
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of the parameter IDs are wrong

        Returns:
        User new User object
        Throws:
